attributes.additional_details:
This week a dog has been taken from their owner and was murdered and left in a local park for passers by to see.

People who do this should get the same jail time as people who murder humans.

It is disguising that people don't receive a long enough jail time for them to learn it is wrong.


We can only make changes to animal cruelty if we all stick together and make our voices heard.

We will be heard and this needs to change.
attributes.background:
Animal cruelty and animal murder should be considered as human murder and receive same jail time.
The amount of animals I have seen hurt and mistreated on the Internet is disgusting.
